@DearHeartxoxo Plus I make sure Pepper's rabies tag is clean and legible so she's wearing proof she's not gross :P
@DearHeartxoxo Okay well I don't think that would be an issue ... I was seriously worried it would come out of her pay
@DearHeartxoxo they all know Pepper and know I keep her up to date on everything Hell none of them know me it's all HI PEPPER LOL
@DearHeartxoxo I offered to wait and pay after she was done and she said it was on her so I over tipped her bc come one that's nuts
@DearHeartxoxo her co worker wouldn't get off the computer to do the invoice She knows Pep so knows she's up to date on everything
